version.description1: Config version number used for auto_regen_outdated.

auto_regen_outdated.description: Should this file automatically regenerate whenever the default options are changed?

enabled.description: Should corpses that spread gore be placed when Things are killed?

wall_palmer_chance.description: 1 in this number chance for any wall tentacle block with sufficient support to instead be a wall palmer.

tunnel_gore_time.description1: Minimum age of a tunnel block in ticks required for it to start spreading gore blocks.
tunnel_gore_time.description2: Set to a negative value to disable.
